backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, goals, tasks, reviews, and access-controlled CRUD operations with internal maps for per‑user data.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and CSS variable definitions for light/dark themes and semantic color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication, profile setup flow, goal library modal, routing, and theming.
frontend/src/components/AutoPlanner/Auto: UI for entering or selecting a goal template and triggering auto‑plan generation.
Review/edit screen for generated plans with mutations to save goals, tasks, milestones, and lock them in.
Handles the Auto Planner flow, switching between goal input and reviewing a generated plan.
frontend/src/components/DailyCheckIn.tsx: Displays daily tasks for a goal, lets users mark completion or reasons for missing, and submits the check-in.
frontend/src/components/DashboardHome.ts: Renders the dashboard home with a welcome header and navigation cards for key app sections.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing copyright and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/GoalDefinitionFl: Multi-step form for creating a goal, collecting description, timeframe, and motivation.
frontend/src/components/GoalDetail.tsx: Shows detailed goal info with tabs for planning, daily tasks, weekly tasks, and overview, depending on lock status.
frontend/src/components/GoalLibraryModal: Modal that lists predefined goal templates, allowing users to select and create goals from them.
frontend/src/components/GoalsOverview.ts: Displays a user's goals, allows creating new goals or selecting from a goal library, and shows goal cards with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with theme switching, accent color selection, login handling, and user profile dropdown actions.
frontend/src/components/lockedIn/CheckIn: Renders a 7‑day check‑in streak ticker with completion indicators based on daily check‑in stats.
frontend/src/components/lockedIn/LockedI: Shows all locked‑in goals with check‑in stats and offers navigation to the Auto Planner when none exist.
frontend/src/components/PlanningPhase.ts: Guides users through creating milestones and tasks for a goal and finalizing the plan with a lock-in step.
frontend/src/components/profile/emojiOpt: Exports a list of emoji options for user profile customization.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating or editing a user profile with name and emoji avatar selection, saving changes via mutation.
frontend/src/components/SettingsPanel.ts: Provides profile editing, avatar selection, principal copying, and sign‑out controls within a settings view.
frontend/src/components/WeeklyPlan/Weekl: Shows weekly planning status, prompting users to create an auto plan or listing locked‑in goal plans.
Displays a goal card with metrics, milestones, and weekly/daily tasks, expandable to show detailed progress data.
frontend/src/components/WeeklyReview.tsx: Provides a weekly review UI where users mark weekly tasks complete and submit progress summaries.
frontend/src/contexts/DashboardNavigatio: Provides context for tracking and updating the active dashboard section.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccentPreset.ts: Manages selectable UI accent color presets and syncs them to CSS variables and local storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements authentication via Internet Identity, managing identity state, login flow, and persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for loading and mutating user profiles, goals, and goal-related data via an actor API with toast feedback.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes along with utility classes and background styles.
frontend/src/lib/autoPlanner/generatePla: Generates a structured plan with milestones and tasks based on a goal description and timeframe.
frontend/src/lib/goalTemplates.ts: Provides predefined goal templates with milestones and tasks for various categories like study, fitness, and productivity.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the dashboard layout with navigation, side menu, and dynamic section rendering based on user selection.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the marketing homepage with hero content, features, and login handling via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/utils/dates.ts: Provides helpers to convert nanosecond bigint timestamps to Dates and format them as date, datetime, or relative strings.
frontend/src/utils/trackingMetrics.ts: Computes 7‑day check‑in stats and aggregates goal metrics from daily check‑ins and weekly reviews.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, layout, animations, and plugin setup for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking schema version, issues, and a pending UI fix request for button styling consistency.
